citation_details.title: A novel family of divergent seven-transmembrane proteins: candidate odorant receptors in Drosophila
citation_details.author: PJ Clyne, CG Warr, MR Freeman, D Lessing, J Kim
citation_details.abstract: Although insects have proven to be valuable models for exploring the function, organization,  and development of the olfactory system, the receptor molecules that bind odors have not
citation_details.short_author: PJ Clyne, CG Warr, MR Freeman, et al.
